snippet: The announcement, expected Friday, will most likely involve a Lexus line. It would be the first time the Lexus model had been built in America.
abstract: Toyota Motor Corporation is expected to announce expanded operations at its plant in Kentucky, including first-ever production of luxury Lexus models in United States; shift underscores stiff competition among leading automakers to capture luxury market, which has grown faster than other auto sales.

byline.contributor: Ian Austen contributed reporting from Ottawa.

lead_paragraph: The announcement, expected Friday, will most likely involve a Lexus line. It would be the first time the Lexus model had been built in America.

headline.seo: Toyota Said to Plan to Make Lexus ES in Kentucky
headline.main: Toyota Said to Plan Lexus Plant in Kentucky
headline.print_headline: Toyota Said To Plan Lexus Plant In Kentucky

keywords.value: Lexus Division of Toyota Motor Corp
keywords.name: organizations
